meanings.definition: Treat (a person) as a celebrity or as a heroic figure.
meanings.sent1: The town lionises the local firefighter for his bravery.
meanings.sent2: The community lionises the mayor for her dedication to public service.
meanings.sent3: The school playfully lionises the janitor as the unsung hero of the school.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of her fans, the singer lionises the rock star as a god of music.
meanings.sent5: The children's book lionises the main character as the bravest knight in the kingdom.

meanings.definition: Regard or treat (someone) as a hero or as a very important person.
meanings.sent1: The teacher lionises the student who always helps others in class.
meanings.sent2: The company lionises its top salesperson for exceeding targets consistently.
meanings.sent3: The family playfully lionises the family pet as the guardian of the house.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the team, the coach lionises the captain as the heart of the team.
meanings.sent5: The community lionises the volunteer who selflessly helps those in need.
